description: The statement gave instruction for the public communique of the government to seek grounds for the approval to produce the needs address of the scient whom
full_summary:
## Request for Proposal: Generator Replacement at Health Canada Facility in Longueuil

**Tender Information**
======================

* **Title (English / French):** EF944-231871 - Generator Replacement
* **Reference Number:** WS3921007516-Doc3921129394
* **Amendment Number:** 4
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3921007516
* **Publication Date:** March 16, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date (EDT):** May 4th, 2023, 2:00 PM (Please note: original Ariba Discovery posting response deadline has been superseded)
* **Amendment Date:** April 26, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024
* **Status:** Expired

**Solicitation Details**
-----------------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the replacement of a generator at the Health Canada Laboratory in Longueuil. This project falls under UNSPSC Code *72121500 (Industrial Plant Construction Services).

A list of pre-qualified suppliers who have a Supply Arrangement in place have been invited to submit bids. Interested bidders must review and familiarize themselves with the solicitation documents, which can be found in the attached document.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Joël Lussier (SPAC/PSPC)
* E-mail: [joel.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:joel.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Fax: N/A
* Address: Not applicable (regular business hours)

**Contract Information**
-------------------------

Supplier documents may be obtained by contacting the contracting entity as mentioned above.

**Location**
------------

The contract will be executed in Longueuil.

Note that all details regarding the requirement can be found in the solicitation document.

### Excerpt from the contract wordings: 

" All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2:00 PM EDT on May 4th 2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive."
